channel.title: Barrows brothers spawning, Delta
channel.description:
hi, im making a barrows mini and im making it so when you click the coffin the guy spawns or you get a message saying youve found a tunnel, ive got the spawning and tunnel message working i was just wondering if any1 knows of a way to: 1. make the npc attack you on spawn. 2. make the npc say something on spawn.
any help is appriciated :) thanks.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 30, 2008, 06:48:45 pm[/size][hr]comon ppl i need help! :P
